data.name: Water Fall
data.detailed_description:
An atmospheric side-scroller about a girl who travels through a world where water is in short supply.

Solve spatial puzzles and engage in action and explore elaborate locations in an immersive narrative-driven game.

In the near future there was a gravitational anomaly on the Moon and all the water from the Earth's surface rose to a height of almost 10 kilometers. The atmosphere transformed into a hydrosphere and water rose evenly over the surface of the planet.
data.about_the_game:
An atmospheric side-scroller about a girl who travels through a world where water is in short supply.

Solve spatial puzzles and engage in action and explore elaborate locations in an immersive narrative-driven game.

In the near future there was a gravitational anomaly on the Moon and all the water from the Earth's surface rose to a height of almost 10 kilometers. The atmosphere transformed into a hydrosphere and water rose evenly over the surface of the planet.
data.short_description: Immersive side-scroller in a world where water has become scarce
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Latin America, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Turkish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8.1 64-bit or Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100T or AMD FX 6100
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 or AMD R7 260x
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 8.1 64-bit or Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3570K or AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 980 or AMD R9 290X
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
